#summary namespace and resource discovery registries

= Resource Discovery Registry =
prefix dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

prefix registry: <http://bio2rdf.org/registry:>

prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> 

prefix skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core>

[http://semanticscience.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wiki/registry-example.n3 Example file]


===Namespace===
{{{
 rdfs:label [string]                      # title [identifier]
 a registry:[Namespace|OfficialNamespace] # only the registry creates Official namespaces
 dcterms:identifier [string]              # aka prefix[e.g. "kegg"]
 
 dcterms:replaces [Namespace]             # for superceding namespaces [e.g. registry:ns/kegg replaces nar:kegg]
 skos:narrower [Namespace]                # for aggregation namespaces [e.g. kegg 'has narrower' kegg_ligand]
 registry:source [Publisher]              # the source/publisher of the namespace (e.g. Registry, NAR, GO)
 
 registry:dataset [Dataset]               # the resource to which this namespace applies 
}}}


===Dataset===
{{{
 rdfs:label [string]                     # title [identifier]
 dcterms:title [string]                  # a brief summary of the resource [e.g. UniProt]
 dcterms:description [string]            # a more elaborate description 
 dcterms:subject [url|ns:id|string]      # a curated subject heading [e.g. protein]
 dcterms:publisher [Publisher Record]    # link to the original/primary publisher [E.g. UniProt Consortium]
 foaf:homepage [url]                     # the homepage of the resource [e.g. http://uniprot.org]
 registry:id_example [string]            # an identifier in the dataset [e.g. 12345] 
 registry:id_specification [regex]       # a regular expression to validate the identifier against
 registry:references [Dataset]           # for linked data cloud
}}}

===Publisher===
{{{ 
 rdfs:subClassOf [foaf:Agent] 
 rdfs:label [string]                     # title [identifier]
 dcterms:identifier [string]             # source + short name [e.g. registry:publisher/bio2rdf]
 foaf:name [string]                      # the publisher's name [e.g. Bio2RDF]
 foaf:mbox [string]                      # the publisher's email address for contact purposes
 foaf:homepage [url]                     # the publisher's homepage [e.g. http://bio2rdf.org]
}}}


===Resolver===
Provides some resource specified with a URL regex for a given resource with a particular namespace in different formats
{{{
 rdfs:label [string]                     # title [identifier]
 registry:resolves [Namespace]           # a resolver resolves one or more preferred namespaces
 registry:output_format [string]         ["html"|"txt"|"tab"|"n3"|"xml"|"rdfxml"|"virtuosodb"] 
 registry:resolver_status [string]       ["primary"|"secondary"|"ternary"] 
                                         # primary is the original data provider's data, in whatever format. secondary is an exact mirror copy. ternary is a derivative work.
 dcterms:publisher [Publisher]           # the publisher of this resolver [e.g. Bio2RDF is the publisher of an RDF resolver]
 
  
 registry:availability [string]          # ["free"|"free for academic"|"commercial"|"not available"|"see license"] 
 dcterms:license [url]                   # a document that provides usage rights
 dcterms:source [uri|Resolver]           # for derivative works: the original source of this data
}}}
{{{
 URLResolver rdfs:subClassOf Resolver
   registry:url [url regex]                  # A regular expression for the constructing the URL, using variables $ns for the namespace and $id for the identifier [e.g. http://bio2rdf.org/$ns:$id]
}}}
{{{
 WSDLResolver rdfs:subClassOf Resolver
   registry:url [url regex]                  # WSDL file
}}}
{{{
 SPARQLResolver rdfs:subClassOf Resolver
   registry:url [url regex]                  # SPARQL endpoint [e.g. http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql]
   registry:graph_uri                        # Default graph URI
   registry:sparql_result_format [string]    ["auto","rdfxml","n3","xml","json","html"]
}}}

==Document==
{{{
 rdfs:label [string]                         #
 rdfs:subClassOf [foaf:Document]             #
 rdf:type [URI]                              [HTMLDocument, XMLDocument, RDFXMLDocument, OWLXMLDocument, etc]
 registry:mimetype [string]                  ["xhtml",etc]
}}}


==Statistics==
{{{
 rdfs:label [string]                     # title [identifier]
 dcterms:identifier [uri]                # source + short name [e.g. registry:statistics/bio2rdf/uniprot/n3]
 registry:records [integer]              # number of entries in the core namespace
 registry:topics [integer]               # number of unique entities
 registry:triples [integer]              # number of unique statements
 registry:size [integer]                 # of bytes the file contains
 registry:data [Resolver]                # the data for which the statistics were compiled
}}}
